afae9e00cd7f8a45e636157a6088c0ba7d8425ad.commit.message:
*) Again refactored the filename parsing stuff. Still room for improvements/cleanup but we are on the way.
Now VFS only escapes parts of the uri which are internally used. That is:
% - generally
! - sometimes e.g. archive base filesystems (jar/tar)
? - for http/webdav filesystems for special handling of the query string
*) FileObject.findFiles now returns null if the base file do not exist.
Submitted By: tcurdt -at- apache.org
*) SftpFileSystem now correctly handles files with space in its name
*) Moved on to commons-net 1.4 but still backward compatible to 1.2
*) src/utils: unix script to recreated the archive files used by some tests

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/vfs/trunk@191323 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
afae9e00cd7f8a45e636157a6088c0ba7d8425ad.commit.author.name: Mario Ivankovits

5264758fbd83a41b9e286eb0291efffdcd098288.commit.message:
PR: 35198
Submitted By: Christopher Ottley <xknight -at- users.sourceforge.net>

Use URL.openStream to pass the configuration to the DocumentBuilder. This is to fix a problem where the URL externalized form cant be reparsed by the DocumentBuilder.

c3a3e370afac9223585e6580781364772ec270ab.commit.message:
PR: 34976
Reported By: Jin Choi <jsc -at- alum.mit.edu>

When replicating files get rid of reserved and maybe dangerous characters. This allows replication of files like "http://hostname.org/fileservlet?file=abc.txt".
